item.title: Markdown Cheat Sheet
item.description:
Derived from https://towardsdatascience.com/the-ultimate-markdown-cheat-sheet-3d3976b31a0

Headings

There are few options to create headings. We can use Markdown or HTML or an alternative syntax to create our desired headings.

item.title: mkdocs info
item.description:
External Resources

pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material mkdocs-glightbox
  • https://stackoverflow.com/questions/27882261/mkdocs-and-mathjax
  • https://www.mkdocs.org/user-guide/writing-your-docs/
  • https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/
  • https://www.markdownguide.org/tools/mkdocs/
  • https://facelessuser.github.io/pymdown-extensions/extensions/

load mathjax at the beginning:
